summary: Lately, I've been feeling like I'm just moving through the days without much purpose. I get up, do what I need to do, but everything feels heavier than it should be. Even small tasks like answering messages or making breakfast feel screaming. I know I'm not in crisis, but I can't remember the last time I felt genuinely excited about something. I wonder if this is just stress or if I'm slipping to something deeper. Okay. So now...
